synopsis.text: Mini-Dora robots, treasure maps, and a mysterious island await Nobita and his friends in the Caribbean Sea! Inspired by the tale of Treasure Island, Nobita embarks on a daring journey to discover an unknown island, accompanied by Doraemon, Shizuka, Gian, and Suneo. As the newly appointed captain of their ship, Nobita faces unexpected challenges, including pirate attacks and a fierce storm. But when Shizuka is kidnapped, the stakes are raised, and the friends must rely on their wits and the help of their Mini-Dora robots to rescue her. As they finally reach the enigmatic Treasure Island, they uncover a secret that transcends their wildest dreams â€“ the island is not just an ordinary island, but a massive spaceship belonging to time-traveling pirates! Will Nobita and his friends save their friend and protect their home planet from these intergalactic marauders? Join them on this thrilling adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
